abstract: You may have a few other troubleshooting steps available if the Rebuild command under the Mailbox menu has not resolved the problem.
snippet: You may have a few other troubleshooting steps available if the Rebuild command under the Mailbox menu has not resolved the problem.
lead_paragraph: Q. I tried the Rebuild command to find missing messages in Mac Mail on the El Capitan version (OS X 10.11), but it didn’t fix my problem. What else can I try?

headline.main: Digging Deeper for Missing Mac Mail Messages
